A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Worst Star Wars film ever. Wait\, worst Star Wars THING ever. A bad combination of lame jokes\, unimportant scenes and choices that didn't stay true to characters. Basically destroys the jedi and everything they fought for. Makes it seem As if you can't stand up for what you believe in or you might hurt someone's feelings and they'll go kill a bunch of people and it's your fault. The best part of the movie was when Garreth Edwards had a cameo\, I thought \"oh\, someone that's a true Star Wars fan.\" If you want to see luke drink green milk out of swollen alliens nipples and make a weird face\, 10/10 recommend.
